content: this gorgeous shawl will look amazing with most outfits even though it has wooden beads on the fringe it is light weight which makes it perfect for summer wear when you pair it with a sweater or jacket it will definitely keep you warm during the other three seasons it s versatility makes it a must have for your wardrobe it s crocheted using a modified granny square design instead of using three double crochets this pattern uses two half double crochets the lack of the extra step in the stitch helps this garment to work up quickly and easily there is a detailed photo tutorial included in the pattern for the fringe attachment and beading
